mapper.sql: id, agent_id, hotline, qq, biz_no, meiqia_status, meiqia_entid, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into o_agent_cust_service (id, agent_id, hotline, qq, biz_no, meiqia_status, meiqia_entid, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meiqiaStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{meiqiaEntid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update o_agent_cust_service
agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hotline = #{hotline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
biz_no = #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meiqia_status = #{meiqiaStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
meiqia_entid = #{meiqiaEntid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update o_agent_cust_service set agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hotline = #{hotline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_no = #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meiqia_status = #{meiqiaStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, meiqia_entid = #{meiqiaEntid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t1.* from o_agent_cust_service t1 LEFT JOIN o_agent t2 on t1.agent_id=t2.id where t1.agent_id = #{agentId} and t2.delete_flag=1

select
from o_agent_cust_service where meiqia_entid = #{meiqiaEntid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 5
